snippet.title: GHOST CAM TEASER | VR | ARCH REBELS
snippet.description:
Can you find a ghost? Can you capture it - or will you get caught out...

GHOST CAM is a spooky VR game where you test your ghost finding skills while exploring a mysterious roomscale environment, developed by indie creative studio ARCH REBELS for release in 2022.

*No ghosts were harmed in making this video*
